actions.recommendation: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
You are due for another Pap Smear screening. I am so glad to hear that your last results were normal. Regular screening helps early detection of any irregularities and improves management outcomes.

Overall you have a good baseline of building good habits into your lifestyle. We discussed a few areas that can be optimised. Sleep quality, regular exercise & a healthy diet show many benefits. This will help improve your general well-being & long term health outcomes.

Regular breast self-examinations are recommended. If any irregularities noted to follow up with your GP for review.
We can repeat your blood pressure in 1/12 & review any further concerning symptoms that may arise.
